tool.name: Combine Annotations [SPAC][DMAP]
tool.description: Combine multiple annotations into a new annotation using a defined separator.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}, "analysis": {"type": "file", "name": "output.pickle"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --list-values Annotations_Names --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.combine_annotations_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: List of annotations to be combined.

param.name: New_Annotation_Name
param.label: New Annotation Name
param.help: Annotation to be added to the dataset, containing the new labels after concatenation.

param.name: Separator
param.label: Separator
param.help: A string to add between labels during concatenations.

tool.help: **Combine Annotations [SPAC][DMAP]** Combine multiple annotations into a new annotation using a defined separator.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv) - analysis: file (output.pickle)
